description: Large gray-brown goose with orange bill and pink legs. Ancestor of domestic geese.
call_description: Loud honking "aahng-ung-ung" in flocks, harsh alarm calls

description: Large wading bird with gray plumage, white head, black crest stripe.
call_description: Harsh, loud "frank" or "kraak" call, usually in flight

description: Small wader with brown upperparts, white underparts, constantly bobbing tail.
call_description: High-pitched "weet-weet-weet" in flight, rhythmic and piping

description: Medium goose with pink legs and bill, dark head, pale breast.
Bulky wader with heavily barred flanks, bold wingbars in flight. Globally declining species migrating from Arctic breeding grounds to sub-Saharan Africa.
call_description: Migration flight calls: weak croaking 'etch-etch-etch' when flushed during stopover. Usually silent during migration. (Note: Lek displays with bubbling/wheezing occur only in breeding season April-May, not during October migration period)

description: Large, long-legged pipit with upright stance, streaked upperparts.
Chunky wader with cryptic brown plumage, long bill, large eyes.
call_description: Roding display: low croaking "orr-orr-orr" followed by high "tswick"

description: Small flycatcher with orange-red throat (males), white tail patches.
Arctic bunting, breeding males white with black back, females brownish.
call_description: Rippling "tirr-it-it-it" in flocks, sweet whistled song

description: Brown crow with white spots, specialist on pine seeds.
Small secretive warbler with streaked brown plumage.
call_description: Continuous mechanical reeling trill, like fishing reel, for minutes

description: Black and white corvid with long tail, iridescent blue-green wings.
Bright yellow bunting (males) with chestnut rump, streaked back.
Large finch, males rosy-red, females yellow-olive, thick bill.
Black crow with bare grayish face patch at bill base, shaggy thighs.
call_description: Harsh "kaah" or "krah", less varied than Carrion Crow

description: Gray body with black head, wings, and tail - distinctive two-tone crow.
Small thrush with red flanks, prominent white eyebrow stripe.
call_description: Thin, high "tseeep" in flight, especially at night during migration

description: Very large gray crane with black-and-white neck, red crown patch.
call_description: Loud, trumpeting "kroooh" calls, bugling in flight

description: All-black crow with heavy bill, less sociable than Rook.
Common dabbling duck, males with green head, females mottled brown.
call_description: Females: loud quacking, Males: soft nasal "breep"

description: Gray-brown goose with white face patch, black belly bars (adults).
Chunky finch, males bright yellow-green with yellow wing edges.
call_description: Nasal, wheezing "dzweee", twittering songs with trills

description: Small brown streaky pipit of open country, pale legs.
call_description: Thin "tseep-tseep-tseep" in flight, parachuting song flight

description: Tiny bird with blue crown, yellow breast, white cheeks.
call_description: Churring "tsee-tsee-tsee", varied trills and scolding notes

description: Finch with orange breast and shoulders, white rump (in flight).
Streaked pipit of woodland edges, pink legs, bold face pattern.
call_description: Song flight ending in "seee-seee-seee" descending parachute

description: Large black-and-white wader with long orange-red bill, pink legs.
Very large wader with extremely long down-curved bill, mottled brown.
call_description: Mournful "cur-lee" call, bubbling song in display flights

description: Small dark goose with black head and neck, white neck patch.
call_description: Soft rolling "rronk" or "rrot", croaking in flocks

description: Plover with crest, iridescent green upperparts, white underparts.
Large gamebird, males colorful with long tail, white neck ring.
call_description: Loud crowing "kok-kok" followed by whirring wing beats

description: Wagtail with gray upperparts, yellow underparts, very long tail.
call_description: Sharp metallic "chis-sik", higher than Pied Wagtail

description: Large goose with black neck, white chinstrap, brown body.
call_description: Deep honking "ah-honk", trumpeting calls in flocks

description: Plump black waterbird with white bill and frontal shield.
Secretive rail with long red bill, barred flanks, lives in reeds.
Slim wagtail with yellow underparts, greenish back, constantly pumping tail.
call_description: High "tsweep" in flight, softer than other wagtails

description: Black-and-white wagtail with long tail, constantly wagging.
Large white swan with straight neck, small yellow bill spot.
Small bird with orange-red face and breast, olive-brown upperparts.
Dark waterbird with red bill shield, white side stripes, green legs.
Medium gull, breeding: chocolate-brown head, red bill and legs.
call_description: Harsh screaming "kree-ar", laughing calls in colonies

description: Large white swan with straight neck, yellow bill with black tip.
call_description: Loud bugling "whoop-whoop", trumpeting honks in flight

description: Small wader with very long bill, cryptic striped plumage.
call_description: "Chip-per" on take-off, drumming wing sound in display

description: Small bunting with rusty face, white eye-ring, streaked crown.
Large gray-and-white gull with yellow bill, red spot on lower mandible.
call_description: Loud "kyow-kyow-kyow", long call with head thrown back

description: Small finch with red forehead, black chin, streaked flanks.
Plump gamebird with orange face, gray breast, dark belly patch.
call_description: Rusty, creaking "kieerr-ik" at dawn and dusk

description: Large thrush with spotted breast, white tail corners, upright stance.
call_description: Harsh rattling "churr-churr", loud fluty song in storms

description: Smallest swallow with brown upperparts, white underparts, brown breast band.
Pink-brown crow with blue wing patch, white rump, black tail.
Small greenish warbler with long pale eyebrow, wing bar.
Arctic bunting, breeding males with black face, chestnut nape.
Large thrush with gray head, chestnut back, heavily spotted breast.
Stocky plover, breeding: black underparts, winter: gray-brown.
Large shrike with gray upperparts, black mask, white wing patches.
call_description: Harsh "shek-shek", varied warbling with harsh notes

description: Small wader, breeding: black belly patch, rufous back.
call_description: Nasal "treee" or "kreep", purring trill in display

description: Crow-sized woodpecker, entirely black with red crown.
call_description: Loud, ringing "kri-kri-kri", drumming resonant and slow

description: Large dark goose with orange bill band, orange legs.
Europe's largest owl with prominent ear tufts, orange eyes.
call_description: Deep, resonant "ooh-hu" hooting, carries for kilometers

description: Smaller than Taiga Bean-Goose, shorter neck, stubbier bill.
Bunting with olive-gray head, yellow throat, pink bill.
Small swallow with white rump, deeply forked tail, blue-black upperparts.
call_description: Soft twittering "prrit", dry rattling at nest

description: Small oceanic gull with black wingtips, yellow bill, black legs.
Medium raptor with broad rounded wings, variable brown plumage.
Gray dabbling duck, males with black stern, white speculum.
call_description: Females: harsh quacking, Males: nasal "meep" or whistle

description: Graceful tern with black cap, red-orange bill with black tip.
Smallest loon, breeding: red throat patch, upturned bill.
call_description: Wailing, goose-like calls in flight, eerie on breeding grounds

description: Plover with golden-spangled upperparts, breeding: black underparts.
call_description: Mournful whistle "tuu-ee", liquid song in display flight

description: Bunting of wetlands, breeding males with black head, white collar.
Like Common Tern but shorter legs, all-red bill, longer tail.
Small brown bird with gray head and breast, thin bill.
Secretive rail of meadows, buff plumage, chestnut wings.
call_description: Loud rasping "crex-crex" repeated endlessly at night

description: Diving duck, males with round white face spot, golden eye.
call_description: Nasal "beeer", wings whistle loudly in flight

description: Massive all-black crow with wedge-shaped tail, shaggy throat.
call_description: Deep cronking "pruk-pruk", varied including knocking sounds

description: Secretive warbler like Grasshopper-Warbler but less streaked.
Medium owl, mottled brown, large dark eyes, rounded head.
Europe's smallest owl, brown with white spots, yellow eyes.
